localize.title: Buzzing on The Economist
localize.description: See what's buzzing on The Economist in your native language

localize.title: エコノミスト人気の記事
localize.description: 人気のエコノミスト記事を日本語で閲覧

blogPost.title: Since 2012, the royal family has received a “sovereign grant". It is currently set at 25% of the crown estate’s annual profits and last year paid out £82.4m ($114m) https://t.co/Hv3UzXJ5QP
blogPost.author: The Economist

localize.full_text: 自2012年起，王室获得了一笔 "主权赠款"。目前，它被设定为王室财产年利润的25%，去年支付了8240万英镑（1.14亿美元）https://t.co/Hv3UzXJ5QP。
自2012年起，王室獲得了一筆 "主權贈款"。目前，它被設定爲王室財產年利潤的25%，去年支付了8240萬英鎊（1.14億美元）https://t.co/Hv3UzXJ5QP。

previous.title: Asma Assad has become one of Syria's foremost war profiteers and ruthlessly cemented herself as one of the country's key economic and political brokers. @1843mag charts her rise https://t.co/nW2Psho3mN

localize.full_text: 阿斯玛-阿萨德已经成为叙利亚最重要的战争获利者之一，并无情地巩固了自己作为该国重要经济和政治经纪人之一的地位。@1843mag 描绘她的崛起 https://t.co/nW2Psho3mN
阿斯瑪-阿薩德已經成爲敘利亞最重要的戰爭獲利者之一，並無情地鞏固了自己作爲該國重要經濟和政治經紀人之一的地位。@1843mag 描繪她的崛起 https://t.co/nW2Psho3mN

next.title: Footage of Christopher Wallace recording his first demo aged 14, based around a sample of Toto’s “Africa”, suggests his interest in melody, as well as beats and rapping, developed early https://t.co/aMpHSe5R0r

localize.full_text: 克里斯托弗-华莱士（Christopher Wallace）14岁时录制第一张样带的片段，围绕着Toto的 "Africa "样本，表明他对旋律、节拍和说唱的兴趣，很早就发展起来了https://t.co/aMpHSe5R0r。
克里斯托弗-華萊士（Christopher Wallace）14歲時錄製第一張樣帶的片段，圍繞着Toto的 "Africa "樣本，表明他對旋律、節拍和說唱的興趣，很早就發展起來了https://t.co/aMpHSe5R0r。
